text: Ati nitori oro won (yii): “Dajudaju awa pa Mosih, ‘Isa omo Moryam, Ojise Allahu.” Won ko pa a, won ko si kan an mo agbelebuu, sugbon A gbe aworan re wo elomiiran fun won ni. Dajudaju awon t’o yapa-enu nipa re, kuku wa ninu iyemeji ninu re; ko si imo kan fun won nipa re afi titele erokero. Won ko pa a ni amodaju. surah ali ‘Imron; 3:7 surah al-’Ani‘am; 6: 99 ati
